actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit use of Federal funds to perform abortions except where the life of the woman would be endangered.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of Federal funds to perform abortions except where the life of the mother would be endangered if the fetus were carried to term.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit use of Federal funds to perform abortions except where the life of the woman would be endangered.
